page.title: 13Hayes Town
page.content: My group covered Hayes Town. It was not very large, but was very busy for its size. Most buildings were shops or houses and it was very noisey with the airport and station nearby. Hayes did not offer a variety of shops; there were lots of food markets. It had only one playing field and park and the sports facilities were not up to a very good standard. There were not enough snack bars or restaurants. All the health shops were hidden and small. The main roundabout was badly organised and very dangerous without lights. We saw one factory which gave off steam every so often. Most of the houses were terraced or semi-detached council houses. There were two petrol stations near together instead of being at either end of Hayes Town. by Alan Baverstock.
